code: import nightwind from"nightwind/helper";import{enterFullScreen,exitFullScreen}from"../utils/screen";export var type={TOGGLE_DARK:"TOGGLE_DARK",SET_VOLUME:"SET_VOLUME",SET_BRIGHTNESS:"SET_BRIGHTNESS",TOGGLE_WIFI:"TOGGLE_WIFI",TOGGLE_BLUETOOTH:"TOGGLE_BLUETOOTH",TOGGLE_AIRDROP:"TOGGLE_AIRDROP",TOGGLE_FULLSCREEN:"TOGGLE_FULLSCREEN"};export var toggleDark=function toggleDark(dark){nightwind.toggle();return{type:type.TOGGLE_DARK,dark:dark};};export var setVolume=function setVolume(volume){return{type:type.SET_VOLUME,volume:volume};};export var setBrightness=function setBrightness(brightness){return{type:type.SET_BRIGHTNESS,brightness:brightness};};export var toggleFullScreen=function toggleFullScreen(fullscreen){fullscreen?enterFullScreen():exitFullScreen();return{type:type.TOGGLE_FULLSCREEN,fullscreen:fullscreen};};export var toggleWIFI=function toggleWIFI(wifi){return{type:type.TOGGLE_WIFI,wifi:wifi};};export var toggleBleutooth=function toggleBleutooth(bluetooth){return{type:type.TOGGLE_BLUETOOTH,bluetooth:bluetooth};};export var toggleAirdrop=function toggleAirdrop(airdrop){return{type:type.TOGGLE_AIRDROP,airdrop:airdrop};};
